## [Incorporating auxiliary information in betweenness measure for input-output networks](publication/xiao2022incorporating.qmd)

<table>
<tr>
<td width="40%">

<td width="60%">
Published in *Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications*, 2022.
        
We propose a novel betweenness centrality measure that incorporates available node-specific
auxiliary information for weighted, directed networks.
        
Recommended citation: Xiao, S., Yan, J. and Zhang, P. (2022).
"Incorporating auxiliary information in betweenness measure for input-output networks".
Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications, 607, 128200.

Published in *Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications*, 2021.
